alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Camden and southeastern Glynn Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Jekyll Island, or 10 miles northeast of Kings Bay Base, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Kings Bay Base, Jekyll Island, Cumberland Island, Harrietts Bluff and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
